articles.title: Manchester United now have six attacking goal threats after Cristiano Ronaldo transfer - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo has re-joined Manchester United and his arrival means the Reds now have one of the best attacking lineups in Europe as they prepare to push for silverware
articles.content:
It's been an ongoing rumour since pretty much the day he left in 2009, but Cristiano Ronaldo is finally back in the famous red of Manchester United.

articles.title: Why this blue moon is also a ‘sturgeon moon’ - Times News Express
